definition: Huaxi district of Guiyang city 貴陽市|贵阳市[Gui4 yang2 shi4], Guizhou
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: Huaxi, in the southern outskirts of Guiyang, is the typical suburban agriculture area in Guizhou.
sentences.chinese: 花溪區地處貴陽市南郊，是貴州典型的城郊農業區。
